description.value: An extension that holds the textual description of the complete medication instructions for use including the period of use.

purpose.value: This extension represents the Description concept of [zib zib InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/InstructionsForUse-v1.2.1(2020EN)). The Dosage datatype and medication resources do not (yet) contain an element that holds a textual description of the complete instructions. In R5 this extension will likely become obsolete due to the addition of `.renderedDosageInstruction` in the medication resources.
